sentences: Huova on pehmeä ja lämmin materiaali.
Tämä huova on hyvä talven kylmyydessä.
context: In Finnish, 'huopa' refers to a thick fabric material that is used as blankets, rugs, or carpets. It's typically made of wool or similar warm materials and provides insulation against cold temperatures. The word can refer to various types of thick woven fabrics depending on context.
